ISSUE.TITLE: IVersionLoader makes many DB requests on resolve
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: `IVersionLoader` [registered](https://github.com/fluentmigrator/fluentmigrator/blob/2bb058de468855a2c3aafa347e77aeb342ce1956/src/FluentMigrator.Runner/FluentMigratorServiceCollectionExtensions.cs#L148) with Scoped lifetime and instances will create every time per client request. On resolving, the version loader makes too many DB-requests that may overflow pool.
